DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.name, T3.Engine+':'+T3.type type, T1.Parameter FROM ORE.dbo.PricingEngineEngineParameters T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.PricingEngineProducts T3 ON T1.type = T3.type

field.name: *type
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.Engine+':'+!T!.type type,!T!.type lookup FROM ORE.dbo.PricingEngineProducts !T! ORDER BY Engine
